meanings.sent1: During omphaloskepsis, she focused on her belly button.
meanings.sent2: He practiced omphaloskepsis to relax and clear his mind.
meanings.sent3: The cat's omphaloskepsis over its navel was quite amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her omphaloskepsis led her to discover hidden thoughts within herself.
meanings.sent5: The art of omphaloskepsis can bring inner peace and self-awareness.

meanings.definition: The act of introspectively examining oneself.
meanings.sent1: Through omphaloskepsis, he delved deep into his own thoughts.
meanings.sent2: Self-improvement often starts with a bit of omphaloskepsis.
meanings.sent3: His omphaloskepsis during the meeting made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: In times of confusion, omphaloskepsis can provide clarity.
meanings.sent5: The power of omphaloskepsis lies in understanding oneself better.
